verses.content: Paula Pathien suok, Pathien ithlanghai ringna kawnga le, Pathien ngaisak tieng thutak hrietna kawnga Isu Krista tirko bawk chun:
Chatuona hringna beiseina chu Pathien khêl hril thei naw chun leilung insieng hmain a tiem a;
nisienlakhawm, ama hun taka- hai chun a thu chu thuinchaa chun a suklang tah a, chu thuincha chu Pathien ei Sandamtu thupêk ang peia inkawltir ka nih.
Tita, ringna hmunkhata ka nau taktak kuomah: Pa Pathien le Krista Isu ei Sandamtu kuoma inthawka lunginsietna le inremna um raw se.
Hi lei hin Kret thlierkâra khan ka mâksan che a nih: thil sukfel bâkhai chu i sukfel pei theina ding le, thu ka pêk che ang khan khaw tinah upahai i ruotna dingin;
tukhawm, sawisêlbo, nuhmei pakhat nei, nauhai Pathien thu awi, inhawi chên taluona kawnga sawisêl hlaw naw, dân naw anga um naw, an ni ta phawt chun.
Kohran hotu chu Pathien sum enkawltu a ni leiin sawisêlbo a ni ding a nih; mi kâwmaw, lunginrawm, uoin inrui hmang, mi vaw hmang, hlêpna inthieng nawa mi duâm a ni ding a ni nawh.
Mi lâwm dân thiem, a ṭha tieng dit, lungril indiktak, mi fel, mi inthieng, insûm thei mi a ni lem ding a nih.
Inchûktirna indik tak kawnga chun mi ân fui theina ding le, sêltuhai chu thiemnaw ân changtir theina dingin inchûktirna ang pei thu ringum chu pawm tlat mi a ni bawk ding a nih.
Dân ang nawa um, thu hril mei meihai le hlêmtuhai tamtak an um sih a, sertanhai laia mi an ni deu tak.
Chuonghai bau chu huppêk ding a nih, hlêpna inthieng naw dit leia thu inchûktir naw ding inchûk- tirin, mihai a sûng sûngin an chawk khawhlo hlak sih a.
Anni laia mi an zâwlnei pakhat ngeiin, “Kret thlierkâra mihai chu khêlhlip dâm, sahrâng suol dâm, thabo buhehai an ni rawp hlak,” tiin a hril kha.
Chu thu inhriettir chu ân dik a nih. Chuleiin, ringnaa chun an indik theina dingin natakin kâwk rawh.
Judahai tienami thu le, thutak nghatsantuhai thupêkhai chu an ngaisak nawna dingin.

Mi inthienghai ta ding chun ieng- kim ân thieng hlak; nisienlakhawm, mi inthieng naw le ring nawhai ta ding chun iengkhawm ân thieng hrim a um ngai nawh, an lungril le an sie le ṭha hrietna hrim khawm ân thieng ta nawh.
“Pathien kan hriet,” tiin an ṭhang hlak a; nisienlakhawm, tirdak- um dâm, thu awi naw dâm, thil ṭha tinrêng thaw kawnga Pathien dit naw zâwnghai an nih, an thilthawin an inphatsan hlak sih a.
